readme.txt - Read Me file 

Copyright (c) 1991-2009 iMatix Corporation

Gaggle is an assorted collection of minor utilities.  Think of Gaggle as
a Swiss Army Knife with lots of extra options, and no knife.

Gaggle forms part of the iMatix "Base" technology toolkit, and is
provided under the GNU General Public License (GPL) for free software
developers, and the iMatix General Terms of Business for commercial
developers.

Gaggle is maintained by iMatix Corporation.  For more information please
see http://www.imatix.com/.
